section.55: The Book of Zuhd and Softening of Hearts

hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported that Allah's Messenger (ï·º) said:When one of you looks at one who stands at a higher level than you in regard to wealth and physical structure he should also see one who stands at a lower level than you in regard to these things (in which he stands) at a higher level (as compared to him)
